transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ji good morning sir, kaise hain?
Customer: Badhiya sir.
Executive: GS Glassware pe baat ho rahi hai na bhai ji?
Customer: Ji haan, GS Glassware se baat ho rahi hai, mai Zeeshan bol raha hu.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji, aap hi service dekhte hai na GS Glassware wali IndiaMART ki?
Customer: Ji haan haan, GS Glassware ki service dekhta hu.
Executive: Ji, ji mai aapke account manager Ashutosh Pandey baat kar raha hu sir.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji bataiye. Ye mai dekh raha hu na ek aapne image share kar rakhi hai WhatsApp pe, to usko add karna hai kya?
Customer: Kya cheez?
Executive: Aapne share WhatsApp pe, to usko add karna hai kya aapke catalog me?
Customer: Ah, mai aapko, ek minute sir.
Executive: Ek product ka image aapne bhej rakha hai sir.
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Ji, to usko aapke catalog me add karna hai kya?
Customer: Ji haan, add kar denge.
Executive: Awaaz aapki kat kat ke aa rahi hai thoda. Ek minute, ek minute, abhi aa rahi hai meri awaaz?
Customer: Haan ji, ab aa rahi hai sahi. Mai ye bol raha hu, abhi aap system pe hai, laptop ya desktop pe?
Customer: Hai kya? Nahi, nahi abhi thoda field work me hu mai.
Executive: Achha achha, field me hai? To abhi aap 5 minute ke liye ek baar connect ho sakte hai to mai wo product dikha sakta hu kaun sa aapne product share kiya hai, kyuki jab tak aap dekhenge nahi tab tak pata kaise chalega. To abhi 5 minute ke liye.
Customer: Nahi nahi, isse Chrome se jo hai mai apne mobile ke Chrome se jaake dekhta hu mai.
Executive: Nahi nahi, aapne mere WhatsApp pe bhej rakha hai na, IndiaMART ke WhatsApp pe bhej rakha hai wo product ke image. To wahi mere ko confirm karna tha.
Customer: Lagta hai, aap mujhe ek baar mujhe return ka return wo kariyega forward zara.
Executive: Ek minute aap line pe rahiye, WhatsApp number yahi hai na aapka?
Customer: Kaunsa hai, boliye zara?
Executive: WhatsApp number yahi hai na? 707
Customer: Ah, nahi 337 pe maine call kiya hai.
Executive: Haan, thik hai, thik hai, ye haan thik hai, bhejiye. Ye aapka WhatsApp number yahi hai?
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Ek minute line pe rahiye.
Executive: Line pe rahiye sir, bhej raha hu ye.
Customer: Nahi uske regarding call aa rahi. Nahi uske regarding mai bhejunga abhi.
Executive: IndiaMART ki koi wo to thik nahi ho.
Executive: Thik hai boss.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Thik hai sir, WhatsApp pe maine pehle to hi ka message kiya aapko.
Customer: Ji, abhi to nahi aaya hai.
Executive: Hi ka message gaya sir aapko? Haan aa gaya aa gaya, aa gaya, thik hai bhejiye. Mai haan ek minute line pe rahiye.
Executive: Ye wali image hai mai aapko bhej de raha hu.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Boliye sir. Kya?
Executive: Ye image aapne bhej rakha hai, share kar rakha hai, dekhiye.
Customer: Check kariye sir WhatsApp pe. Ye image bhej rakha hai kya?
Customer: Haan. Nahi sir, ye nahi.
Customer: Demand. Demand me thi pehle jo hai humne isko khoja tha IndiaMART se pehle.
Executive: Haan haan, achha isko yahi aapko chahiye tha kya?
Customer: Ji, ji ye chahiye tha, ye rubber hai dhakkan me lagti hai, seal wo karne ke liye, type karne ke liye.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Ye chahiye tha.
Executive: Haan haan, to isko add nahi karna hai na?
Customer: Nahi nahi, isko add nahi karna hai. Aise buyer mai dhund raha tha.
Executive: Achha achha, aise buyer dhund rahe the, to wahi aapka aapne lag raha hai image na aapke paas hoga ye yahi pe share kar diye the, hai na?
Customer: Isko hata dijiye aap.
Executive: Achha isko mai isko hata de raha hu, thik hai aur.
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Aapke kuch products bhi add karne hai kya?
Customer: Haan mai add karna karne bas photography ho jaye uske baad mai add karunga jo hai. Mujhe ek complaint bhi karni thi.
Executive: Haan ji bataiye.
Customer: Ek matlab ek buyer ki jo hai matlab wo karna tha ki ek IndiaMART ke through buyer jo hai contact hua. Usne jo hai humse bill will sab banwa liya baad me fraud keh ke jo hai maal nahi liya, hamara bill bhi nuksan me jo hai matlab reh gaya. IndiaMART se jo hai is number ko usme dale jo hai relevant me yani fraud list me ye sabse yahi kar rahi hai.
Executive: Achha aapne chaha hua tha ki matlab.
Customer: Hamara Trade India ka bhi ek portal alag dusre chalate hai unke paas bhi call kiya isi tarah se.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Ji to mai aapko naam batau.
Executive: Achha ji mere ko na jaise WhatsApp pe na WhatsApp pe jo bhi aapke paas details hoga ek baar mere ko share kar dijiye, thik hai? Ji. Aur ek baar mai usko dekhta hu. Baki services kaisi chal rahi hai sir, batayenge mujhe? Service to thik chal rahi hai, wahi apna matlab thik thak hai bas call hai jo hai udhar se aapke samne se nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Samne se call, ek minute call ka dekh de raha hu. Call ka to flow sir abhi mai dekhu to is mahine aapke paas ek call aayi hai, hai na?
Customer: Baki starting me aapke paas 9-9 call aayi hai, call ka response aaya hai, to matlab aapko batayenge mai maximum ki aapko jyada benefit ho raha hai, calls me ho raha hai, inquiries me ho raha hai ya phir?
Customer: Nahi lead uthane pe by lead pe uthane pe hi customer se deal ho pa rahi hai. Aur lagbhag 10% matlab jo hai jo lead hafte ka wo hai wo lagbhag 10% hai.
Executive: Haan, achha thik hai. To matlab lead kam pad ja rahi hai kya aapko?
Customer: Nahi lead nahi kam pad rahi hai, lead to jo hai matlab sahi hai achhi hai lekin matlab wo bata raha hu conversion rate bata raha hu mai aapko.
Executive: Haan haan, matlab by lead by lead jo aapke jaake consume kar rahe hai us pe aap kya bolte hai ki aapka conversion jyada ho raha hai. Success rate haan jo success rate hai matlab jo matlab deal hone ki rate hai wo 10% hai abhi. Aise bahut se buyer kuch buyer to aise the ki jo dekhne hi aaye the. Unhone apni lead dal di maine unse jab phone kiya call uthaya to unhone kaha ki hum to check kar rahe the abhi humko abhi lena nahi hai, ek to aise ho gaya. Achha achha bahut sare hote hai ki jo requirement apni post karte hai aur.
Customer: Aur kuch aise hote hai jo rate ka jo hai bada masla rehta hai to unse ye hai. Yahi hai ki conversion rate usse mujhe koi dikkat nahi hai ki haan wo jo consume ho rahi hai jo real party wo to legi legi maal dekh ke hi. Jarur jarur.
Customer: Ji. Baki ye wali jo image hai ye to aapko add nahi karna hai na? Iske liye maine phone kiya tha. Thik hai mai isko ek baar delete wo kar deta hu. Baki ke mai jab upload kar dunga aur jo to aap jo ek baar jo aapko product add karna hai na phir aap mere ko bhej dijiyega, thik hai? Ji. Okay. Thik hai mai aapko WhatsApp.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to remove an image from catalog.

- Complains about a fraudulent buyer.

- Wants the buyer to be added to fraud list.

- Call volume is low.



Resolution:

- Agreed to remove the image.

- Asked to share details of fraudulent buyer on WhatsApp.

- Executive will check the details.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

fraud, complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, image, fraud, buyer, leads, conversion rate
